Author: irishrimp
Text: I can relate! I've been so overwhelmed with work recently, it's bleeding over into my personal life. I just laugh at how behind I am, even though it isn't funny at all. Like deep down I know I am good at my job, but because I haven't been able to stay on top of things, it's making me believe I am not good at what I do and I should look into a new career. My personal life is a mess right now as I've recently relapsed and I know a lot of that has to do with work... Hang in there! You're not alone
